full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DUL BA RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I TSIG 'GREL RIN CHEN PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @050A *, ,(CES 'DUL BA RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I TSIG 'GREL RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD BRTZON SHES RAB PHUN SUM TSOGS PA RAB 'BYAMS PA DKON MCHOG BRTZON 'GRUS SOGS DON GNYER BA. DU MAS NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYI NGO BO RIGS KUN KHYAB BDAG BDAG GIS MKHAN PO RIN PO CHE RJE BTZUN DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BSTEN PA RGYAL MKHAN PO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNGS LAS BSDUS TE, GNYAN CHEN SKU GLA'I LHA ZHOL DBEN GNAS DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING DU BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG RGYAS SO, ,
